languages.text:
The wielder of this sword gains a +25% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a +25% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.
Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this sword suffer a −25 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} until the wielder's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

被这把剑{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}的敌人，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}会降低25点，效果持续至装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}。

languages.text:
この剣の使い手は{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}に+25%、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}に+25%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。

languages.text:
Этот меч дает персонажу {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} +25% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и +25% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}.

languages.text:
El portador de esta espada obtiene una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +25 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y una bonificación de +25 % a {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}.
El {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} de la espada inflige al enemigo una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −25 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} hasta el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.

Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this sword suffer a −25 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} until the wielder's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:

El {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} de la espada inflige al enemigo una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de -25 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}HA{/g} hasta el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.

languages.text:
Der Führer dieses Schwertes erlangt einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +25 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}.
Feinde, die von diesem Schwert {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g} werden, erleiden einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −25 auf ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g}, und zwar bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des Waffenführers.

languages.text:
L'utilisateur de cette épée reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} de +25 % chacun.
Les ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchés{/g} par cette épée subissent une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de Combat{/g} de −25 jusqu'au {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'utilisateur.
